author: لـولـو عبداللّٰـه البنعلـي
text: Listen to yourself to change how you treat yourself, it reflects in how you treat others..

author: لـولـو عبداللّٰـه البنعلـي
text: Your relationship with others improves once you put in effort to listen to them more and understand them better..

author: لـولـو عبداللّٰـه البنعلـي
text: The first step to loving others is the attempt to understand them..
